name: Hate playing the Meta
author: MrBigTrace
notes:
Went from Leg 1 to KOG promo with OG CA, then disconnected my way back to Leg 1. Did the same with flying fish. After being cucked too often, I invested in the mini box for sylvans. Not proud, but super easy
Mirror match was easy because I would force them to negate my monsters when they didnâ€™t want to. CA was easy too. Would OTK with Econ takes or marshleafs
